title: Exposing for White
subtitle: High-Key Studio Photography
description: Work with white-on-white scenes like models in white clothing against a white backdrop. Learn how to avoid overexposure while maintaining shadow detail.

title: Minimalist Portraits in White
subtitle: Body Language & Light
description: Focus on capturing subtle emotion using facial expressions, gestures, and soft lighting in an all-white environment.

title: Movement in Monochrome
subtitle: Study of Form and Flow
description: Use flowing fabrics and motion against a white backdrop to create ethereal, expressive photographs.

title: Whites in Color
subtitle: Tones and Temperature
description: Explore the warm and cool variations of white. Learn to build dynamic compositions using minimal color and layered brushwork.

title: Negative Space Composition
subtitle: Let White Speak
description: Master the balance between painted and untouched canvas. Use negative space to guide the eye and tell visual stories.

title: Textural Techniques in White
subtitle: Dry Brush, Salt, and Masking
description: Use tools and techniques to create texture in a white-dominant painting without relying on color.

title: White Noise
subtitle: Abstract Concepts in Monochrome
description: Interpret silence, clarity, or isolation using only white and texture. Work with multiple media including paper, paint, and light.

title: Whiteout
subtitle: Erasure & Emergence
description: Paint over previous work using white, then allow new forms to emerge. A workshop exploring transformation and memory.

title: Texture and Tonality Challenge
subtitle: White Macro Study
description: Capture the nuance of texture in white objects — skin, fabric, or paper — using close-up lenses and controlled lighting.

title: Monochrome Mood Studies
subtitle: White and One Color
description: Create an entire emotional study using only white and one color. Develop your expressive voice through constraint.

title: Through the Looking Lens
subtitle: Surreal Self-Portraiture
description: Create self-portraits inspired by Alice in Wonderland using mirrors, costumes, and dreamlike lighting setups.

title: Lighting the Unexpected
subtitle: Glow, Shadow, and Magic
description: Experiment with colored gels, spotlights, and low-key lighting to cast dramatic or magical effects on your subjects.

title: Character Study
subtitle: Model Direction for Fantasy Themes
description: Work with models to bring fictional characters to life. Learn how to direct body language and expression to tell visual stories.

title: Prop Play
subtitle: Visual Narrative Through Set Design
description: Design and photograph whimsical sets using props, smoke, fabric, and foreground tricks to build an immersive image world.

title: Dreamscapes in Motion
subtitle: Slow Shutter & Movement
description: Use blur and long exposure to capture surreal movement and layered dreamlike imagery in your portraits.

title: The Rabbit Hole
subtitle: Unusual Angles & Depth
description: Play with wide-angle lenses, extreme perspectives, and unusual cropping to make the viewer feel like they’ve fallen into a fantasy world.

title: Costume & Color Theory
subtitle: Storytelling with Fabric and Hue
description: Explore how costume styling and coordinated color palettes can elevate your photoshoot from stylistic to cinematic.

title: Eyes Wide Open
subtitle: Dramatic Expression in Portraiture
description: Focus on directing facial expression and gaze to evoke curiosity, tension, and fantasy.

title: Miniature Worlds
subtitle: Forced Perspective & Tiny Sets
description: Create optical illusions using scale, placement, and props to produce whimsical and surreal scenes in-camera.

title: Curiouser and Curiouser
subtitle: Layered Meanings in Visual Art
description: Work with symbolism, metaphor, and narrative layering in photography to suggest deeper stories beneath your visual choices.
